data.text: @xgoatjamesx69 @RayJLeBlanc @Gov_NB I'll tell you what Kevin. After march 14, he can keep wearing a mask since he's obviously scared and while he's at it, he can shove one in his mouth to keep it shut!
@retrowooper @Gov_NB Recover from what?? Lack of staff?? Hire the staff they fired over the vaccine and problem solved.

@Gov_NB Weird how science works exactly at 12:01 each time they intact or remove an order. And even informing us they are removing the mandates weeks in advance because that's the date science works. I guess it is also a coincidence that it is just after March break. That's science !!!

@Gov_NB Finally following the science I see.
Now we just need drop travel restrictions as the World Health Organization advised doing so back in Nov. and we're good.
ppl complaining; you can still wear 3 masks, get 5  
boosters a year and lock yourself down, no one is stopping you.
@jipsafe @Gov_NB If you are that worried wear your mask and I'll give you all mine and you can wear those to. I mean 10 masks should give you some protection.
@GCchick04 @Gov_NB @premierbhiggs If you're scared then wear your mask get your 10th booster and stay home. No one is stopping you from protecting yourself.
@GCchick04 @Gov_NB @premierbhiggs Can't live this way forever... people will die, either way, I think they've finally realized that.
@brundle_fly @Gov_NB Must be nice to have that choice. You know the choice that the unvaxxed DIDNT HAVE.
@JakeC777 @brundle_fly @Gov_NB Unfortunately some will but I will never again support any business that discriminated.
